text:
Thanks Amy, can I also point out that #COVID19 cardiac arrest outcomes are utterly bleak? 
Chance of you surviving an arrest to 30 days with a reasonable neurological outcome?
 <1% !
We discuss this and your study in episode 9 @JournalSpotting. Have a listen!
#chloroquine #resus https://t.co/BG7QYahM83
